amendment.description: An amendment numbered 104 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prevent funds from being used for the Environmental Protection Agency's Solar for All grant competition.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A055) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A055) Agreed to by voice vote.
